safetyTips: The owner and her husband are doing the deliveries. We wear gloves. We place the box outside the door, ring the doorbell and step back at least 2 metres and wait till the box is picked up.
name: The Wine Parlour
description: We are a wine shop and bar with two outlets in Brixton. During this crisis, we are delivering wine to South London customers on Thursdays. Think artisan, small production and delicious.
